body_html:
Hi Alex,

Would you have time & interest in extending the Cholesky gradient code to
the batch case?

Thanks,
Rasmus

On Fri, Apr 8, 2016 at 1:01 AM, Alexander G. de G. Matthews <
notifications@github.com> wrote:

Excellent!

—
